addFundsModal.title: Ongeramo Amafaranga
addFundsModal.donationInfo: 20% by’amafaranga wizigamye bizatangwa mu burezi bw’abana nyuma y’amezi 6. 80% bisigaye bikomeza kuba ibyawe.

impactCalculator.enterAmountToSee: Injiza umubare w’amafaranga urebe ingaruka ushobora guteza
impactCalculator.everyContribution: Buri musanzu, n’iyo waba muto, ufasha gutuma uburezi bugerwaho na bose.
impactCalculator.impactEstimates: Igereranya ry’ingaruka rishingiye ku kiguzi rusange mu turere dukorana

emptyState.noTransactionsDesc: Tangira kubaka vault yawe wongeremo amafaranga bwa mbere. Buri ntambwe igira icyo ivuze mu gutanga umusanzu!
emptyState.noDonationsDesc: Rangiza igihe cyawe cyo kuzigama kugira ngo inkunga zitangwe utangire gutanga ingaruka zifatika mu burezi bw’abana.
emptyState.noResultsDesc: Nta kintu twabonye gihuye n’ibyo washakaga. Gerageza guhindura amahitamo cyangwa amagambo washakishije.
emptyState.noDataDesc: Nta makuru ahari yo kugaragaza ubu. Ongera uze nyuma!
